ITd like to point out once again that the value of these reports
to you depends on you. The April meeting in New York created a climate
of interest and impetus. Many of you went home and got on with the
job. Your experiences in doing that job, no matter how modest, could
be or real help to someone else.

nalist-Actress-Playwright-Singer Maya Andeloii.

"In Your Own Interst,” a five-parter that made
